name: The adventures of Pojann and Mojann
name_original: The adventures of Pojann and Mojann
description:
Welcome to the adventures of Pojann and Mojann

Here you will explore the neighborhood as either Pojann or Mojann. Find the animals hidden and identify the animals. Please enjoy the game and take your time, there is no rush, we are here to have fun. This is a project for the subject CSC683 (Game Design and Development).

Please note that there are some BGM and sprites like the silhouette are from external sources.
